ayas.translation: I CALL TO witness the sun and his early morning splendour,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

ayas.translation: And the moon as she follows in his wake,
The day when it reveals his radiance,
The night when it covers him over,
The earth and its spreading out,
The soul and how it was integrated
And given the faculty of knowing what is disruptive and what is intrinsic to it.
He who nourishes it will surely be successful,
And he who confines it will surely come to grief.
The Thamud denied (the truth) in their perverseness
When among them the great wretch arose,

ayas.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا
ayas.translation: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."

ayas.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
ayas.translation: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
ayas.transliteration: fakadhhabūhu fa`aqarūhā fadamdama `alayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwāhā

ayas.translation: He does not fear the consequence.
